keyMappings:
unmap d

" -- scroll --
map <C-f> scrollFullPageDown
map <C-b> scrollFullPageUp
map <C-d> scrollPageDown
map <C-u> scrollPageUp

" -- navigation --
map ' Marks.activateGotoMode

" -- open --
map p openCopiedUrlInNewTab
map P openCopiedUrlInCurrentTab
map go Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
map gO Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab

" -- link --
map ;f LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab
map ;r LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
map ;p LinkHints.activateModeToOpenIncognito
map ;y LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl
map ;d LinkHints.activateModeToDownloadLink

" -- tab --
map <C-l> nextTab
map <C-h> previousTab
map <a-l> moveTabRight
map <a-h> moveTabLeft
map e visitPreviousTab
map u restoreTab
map gC duplicateTab
map gD moveTabToNewWindow
map dL closeTabsOnLeft
map dH closeTabsOnRight
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
